short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch Salesforce1 in a mobile simulator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
<< NOT BEING ACTIVELY DEVELOPED >>

Click on the device's home button to see options for resizing, minimizing, closing, and toggling whether it should always be on top.

Click and drag anywhere other than the screen to move the window.

Note: this is NOT an official Salesforce project. Salesforce is not responsible for this extension.

Changelog:
0.1.3
- Added Back button and descriptive hover text for buttons
0.1.2
- Added UserAgent override for the device
0.1.0
- Added url bar at the top of settings to override the default (make sure you have http://). Clear the value to return it to its default url.
- Added refresh page capability with f5, cmd+r, ctrl+r, or click the button left of the url bar
